Windlord:

looking to Kup he answered "Sleeping... but she will woke up soon. It 
seems that a Vok Creature take controls of her body..."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Kup came apon a door and opened it.
> 
> Kup: Here you are. If you need anything just use the computer 
terminal. Now if you'll excuse me.
> 
> Kup heads to the med bay.
> 
> Kup: Whats going on here? How is Nightlight?
> 
> 
> Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Fortuneteller went in the direction Kup indicated.
> 
> --- Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > 
> > Kup returns to the briefing room.
> > 
> > Rodimus: How did it go, old friend?
> > 
> > Kup: I'll never like seeing a femmebot cry. She went
> > with Organics to the mess hall.
> > 
> > Rodimus: Would you mind showing Fortuneteller to a
> > free quarters.
> > 
> > Kup: Sure thing, Roddy.
> > 
> > Kup gestures towards the door, allowing
> > Fortuneteller to leave first...
> > 
> > Rodimus returns his attention to Megatron.
> > 
> > Rodimus: Well if there is nothing else to discuss at
> > this time then I'll have quarters set up for you as
> > well. The secure areas of the base will be off
> > limits of course. They are all marked. You may feel
> > free to walk the base however. The mess hall,
> > holodecks, training room and any other recreational
> > activities are at your disposal. Some Maximal
> > hospitality.
> > 
> > 
> > Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Fortuneteller: Since this conversation no longer
> > seems
> > to concern me, perhaps someone could show me to my
> > quarters?  I assume I'll be staying here a while.
> > 
> > --- Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > > : : Kup : :
> > > 
> > > Kup looked up, his optics now focusing on the
> > femme.
> > > He saw the pain she was going through and watching
> > > it hurt him.
> > > 
> > > He walks closer to her, resting his left hand on
> > her
> > > right shoulder.
> > > 
> > > Kup: Only he knows why he did what he did. I'm so
> > > sorry for your loss...
> > > 
> > > At this point he was really at a loss for words.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > Wolfblade:
> > > 
> > > Th femme sat absolutely still for a moment.  She
> > was
> > > wanting to 
> > > distance herself from that bot, but now her spark
> > > ached for his 
> > > presense.  She tried to remain calm and collected,
> > > but she finally 
> > > broke down.  She dropped he tools, and sobbed into
> > > her hands.
> > > "Why... why did he go?  Why did he go with them?"
> > > she questioned 
> > > outloud.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
> > > <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > > > 
> > > > Rodimus: She should be told, but perhaps by
> > > someone with a more 
> > > softer edge. Kup, would you please tell her?
> > > > 
> > > > Kup: You have to give me the heartwrenching jobs
> > > dont ya,' lad. 
> > > I'll take care of it though.
> > > > 
> > > > Kup heads to the science lab, walking in not
> > long
> > > after Wolfblade.
> > > > 
> > > > Kup: Hello. There was more to tell you but I
> > > figure it would be 
> > > better in private rather then up in that briefing
> > > room. I could tell 
> > > that you care for Malice. I'm sorry to tell you
> > > this, lass, but 
> > > Malice was captured. He is now one of Unicron's
> > > Minions.
> > > > 
> > > > Kup looks down, his optics closeing with
> > emotion.
> > > He couldn't look 
> > > her streight in the optics. He had never liked
> > > telling bots bad news 
> > > about their loved ones.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > > Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived:
> > > > 
> > > > Wolfblade sighed heavy again.
> > > > "Where did he go?" she asked as she walked away.
> > 
> > > She returned to 
> > > the 
> > > > lab and sat down on the bench.  Someone wasn't
> > > talking.  And who 
> > > > exactly was that big white bot?  Things didn't
> > > seem right to her, 
> > > but 
> > > > nonetheless, she continued working on the
> > project.
> > > > 
> > > > Megatron watched the femme carefully, noted her
> > > body language, how 
> > > > she presented herself.  She seemed to like
> > Malice,
> > > like him a lot.  
> > > > SHe tried to look annoyed, but he saw through
> > her
> > > ruse.
> > > > "Should I tell her?  Should I tell her Malice
> > was
> > > taken prisoner 
> > > and 
> > > > is now a loyal minion?"
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
> > > <roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus: I'm afraid I do not know the
> > wherabouts
> > > of Malice. As 
> > > for 
> > > > your plan, its interesting. A good idea. I
> > should
> > > note that the 
> > > > possible instability of such a thing does worry
> > me
> > > a bit, but in 
> > > > these times risks must be taken.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Wolfblade:
> > > > >  
> > > > > "Oh!  Yes sir!  Malice and I decided that it
> > > might be a good idea 
> > > > to have a back plan to the cannon already in
> > > construction.  We plan 
> > > > to use a high mass object and collapse it's
> > > gravity, turning it 
> > > into 
> > > > a black hole.  We wanted to launch it in an area
> > > of spatial 
> > > > instability.  Once the black hole had served
> > it's
> > > purpose, we 
> > > planned 
> > > > to open a time rift and send it through.  The
> > rift
> > > should 
> > > neutralize 
> > > > the intense gravity, expanding it to original
> > > size.  In theory 
> > > > anyway."
> > > > > The femme beamed at her explainatio, then a
> > > thought occured to 
> > > her.
> > > > > "Where is Malice anyways?  He went to do
> > > something, he said he'd 
> > > > come back.  hat was mega cycles ago!  Where did
> > he
> > > go?" she asked, 
> > > > masking her concern with annoyance.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus: Thank you for reporting, Wolfblade.
> > We
> > > were just curious 
> > > > as to what you have going on in the science lab.
> > > Could we possibly 
> > > > have a report on your activities?
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> >
